task.question: Why did the herdsmen of Lot and Abraham quarrel?

choices.choice: a. The herdsmen of Lot were stealing sheep
b. Their herds were getting mixed
c. The land could not support both of them
d. Abram was sacrificing Lot's sheep

task.answer: c. The land could not support both of them

task.question: After Lot left Abraham, what did God promise Abraham?

choices.choice: a.  A descendent who would rule
b. All the land he could see
c. A son born of Sarah

task.answer: b. All the land he could see

task.question: After leaving Egypt, Abraham went to what region of Canaan?

choices.choice: a. Lot would return to Haran with his herds
b. Melchisedek would be sought out to solve the problem
c.  All herds would be split evenly

task.question: The sin of the men of Sodom was against whom ?

Why did Lot desire the plain of Jordan?

choices.choice: c. It was a center for trading

task.question: When Abraham returned to the site between Bethel and Ai where he had built an altar, what did he do as he had done before?

choices.choice: a. He gave God a tenth of everything God had blessed him with
c.  He called on the name of the Lord

task.answer: c.  He called on the name of the Lord
